passage: Despite the rain, she remained resolute and continued marching forward.
He tried to console the crying child with a warm hug and a soft lullaby.
She walked into the interview with poise, answering each question with calm confidence.
The teacher commended him for his honesty and integrity.
Even with limited resources, their community thrived through unity and compassion.
The detective deduced the identity of the culprit from subtle clues left behind.
word_meaning: to come to a conclusion using logic or evidence

passage: Her meticulous notes revealed a level of detail rarely seen in student work.
He was skeptical of the plan, raising concerns no one else had considered.
The explanation was so convoluted that even experts struggled to understand it.
word_meaning: extremely complex and difficult to follow
